trans-unit.source: Runs a child activity iteratively as long as a certain condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 只要某個條件為 true，即反覆執行子活動。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WhileActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the WhileActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WhileActivity 是<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>，這表示 WhileActivity 可以包含其他活動。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Before each iteration, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 每個反覆項目之前,<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>屬性進行評估。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A> property evaluates to `false`, the WhileActivity immediately finishes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>屬性評估為`false`，WhileActivity 立即完成。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref>類別使用的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a condition that determines whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> should run or finish.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定條件，可判斷是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref>應執行或完成。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, and set the Condition property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>類別中，加入<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>類別<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>類別，並設定條件屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中 < WhileAndParallel SDK 範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用時，平行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84)。

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[wf_samples#275](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets24.cs#275)] [!code-vb[wf_samples#275](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets24.vb#275)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[wf_samplesē](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/wf_snippets/snippets24.cs#275)][!code-vb[wf_samplesē ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wf_snippets/snippets24.vb#275)]

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> property evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> continues to run.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>屬性評估為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>、 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref>會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref> finishes.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>評估為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>、 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref>完成。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition*> property.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>目標<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition*>屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity.Condition*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得動態子活動中<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities in the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的動態子活動<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity"> </xref>。
